documentation.quickStart: Get your Greptile API key and GitHub token, then deploy to start querying codebases with natural language.
setupInstructions: 1. Obtain a Greptile API key from https://app.greptile.com/settings/api
2. Generate a GitHub personal access token with 'repo' permissions
3. Set the GREPTILE_API_KEY and GITHUB_TOKEN environment variables
4. Deploy the server and start using the MCP tools
